title: N162 Anson PSA 3 looks nicer, N28 Anson
author: Archive

posts.post_title: N162 Anson PSA 3 looks nicer, N28 Anson
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
Prices are shipped and based on what I paid.  The N162 is nicer grade that my other PSA 4 and SGC 50 N162s.  The color is bold and no creases.  Back is clean.  Perfect registration.  Good luck finding another nicer 3 in any holder.  I would go out and say perhaps the nicest VG in the hobby!

First $3,500 takes it shipped OBO.  Paypal add 3%.  



N28 Anson $2100 shipped OBO.  Paypal add 3%
